testcase.classname: Validation of login page in adactin web application
testcase.name: TC03_Validation of SearchHotel page by selecting location the dropdown
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the adactin web application...............................passed Then User verify whether login in page is displayed.........................passed When User enters the valid username and valid password......................passed And User clicks login button in the home page..............................passed Then User verfiy home page is displayed....................................passed When User click the select location dropdown and select the hotel location..passed Then User verify whether hotel location is selected.........................passed
